ygData.subject: Re: lvl 10 Ranger wants to get rich quic
ygData.msgSnippet: Not really : ) you ll probably be pretty poor for a while, though if I were you i d go to kerra isle and kill wisps. You can use the lightstones in a great
ygData.messageBody:
Not really : ) you'll probably be pretty poor for
a while, though if I were you i'd go to kerra isle
and kill wisps. You can use the lightstones in a
great quest (yeah i know a quest : ) in north
karana.<br>if you give a greater lightstone to myrsilla at the
gypsy camp she'll give you a concordance of research
worth around 8 or 9 pp<br>If you give her a regular
lightstone you get another book which is worth a bit less,
but you do get exp for handing all of these things in
: )<br>at level 14 I made over 100pp and half a
level just by saving these stones up hehe<br>you do
need a magic weapon to fight wisps though,
<br><br>theres also some quest in qeynos where you hand in a
gnoll fang to the captain of the guard and you get exp
and a moonstone, you can then trade the moonstone for
blackburrow stout at one of the inns, (i forget the guys
name, you'll have to look it up) but you can sell that
for a bit i think<br><br>hehe hope this helps a lil :
)<br><br>Iridia<br>33 Druid Tarew Marr<br>"Flame of the Phoenix"
